content: Choose whether promotional banners are shown in your {{productName}}.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a descriptive text that explains the choice to display promotional banners in the product name. It appears in the UI as part of a Portal Settings category and is displayed next to an "Ad Management" option on a customization page.

usage.context:
<Text fontSize="16px" fontWeight={700}>
 {t("AdManagement")}
 </Text>
 ) : null}
 <Text>
 {t("AdManagementDescription", { productName: t("Common:ProductName") })}
 </Text>
 <RadioButtonGroup
 className={styles.radioButtonGroup}
 fontSize="13px"
 fontWeight={400}
